function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of proper social safety net system leading to devastating impact during crises.","Impact":"Devastating consequences on livelihoods, destruction of infrastructure, and civil disobedience.","Mitigation":"Establishment of a robust social safety net system and framework for crisis alleviation.","Technologies":"Social management and crisis response technologies.","People":"People losing their livelihoods, businesses, and those affected by civil disobedience.","Owner":"Government, NGOs, and humanitarian organizations."},{"Description":"Failure to curb climate change leading to chaos on a larger scale.","Impact":"Nationwide destruction, civil disobedience, and fatalities.","Mitigation":"Implementation of climate change mitigation measures and addressing systemic gaps in socioeconomic landscape.","Technologies":"Climate change mitigation technologies and social infrastructure development.","People":"General population, businesses, and infrastructure stakeholders.","Owner":"Government, environmental organizations, and community leaders."},{"Description":"Impact of climate change on insects and ecosystems.","Impact":"Disruption of insect life cycles and metabolic rates, impacting ecosystems.","Mitigation":"Monitoring and mitigation of climate change effects on insects and ecosystems.","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring technologies and ecosystem management practices.","People":"Environmental researchers, conservationists, and stakeholders in ecosystem management.","Owner":"Research institutions, environmental organizations, and governmental bodies."}]}
